name: Sisyphus' Sokoban
description:
Push Sisyphus' rock to the top of the mountain
Made with Puzzlescript
Use arrow keys, Z to cancel your last action and R to restart

===

If the ending leaves you confused, you can learn more about the myth of Sisyphus

===
